i<h; i++){\n            for(int j=0; j<w; j++){\n                \n                int anti_j = w-i-1;\n                if(i<h/2 && (i==j || j==anti_j)){\n                    continue;\n                }else if(i>=h/2 && j==w/2){\n                    continue;\n                }else{\n                    \n                    not_y[ grid[i][j]]++; \n                }\n                \n            }\n        }\n        \n        \n        \n        // 5, i: 0,1,2 3 4\n        for(int i=0; i<h/2; i++){\n            \n            int anti_j = w-i-1;\n            \n            arr[ grid[i][i] ] ++;\n            arr[grid[i][anti_j]] ++;\n            cnt+=2;\n        }\n        \n        \n        \n        for(int i=h/2; i<h; i++){\n            int j=w/2;\n            arr[ grid[i][j] ]++;\n            cnt++;\n        }\n        \n        int z = arr[0];\n        int o = arr[1];\n        int t = arr[2];\n        \n//         System.out.println(z+ \" \"+ o + \" \"+ t+ \" \"+cnt);\n        \n//         System.out.println(not_y[0]+ \" \"+ not_y[1] + \" \"+ not_y[2]);\n        \n        \n        int    resz = cnt-z+not_y[0] + Math.min(not_y[1], not_y[2]);\n         int   reso = cnt-o + not_y[1]+ Math.min(not_y[0], not_y[2]);;\n         int   rest =  cnt-t + not_y[2]+ Math.min(not_y[1], not_y[0]);;\n        \n        return Math.min(resz, Math.min(reso, rest));\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-operations-to-write-the-letter-y-on-a-grid","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
